tool_description: Retrieve Facebook data and automate actions (ex. posting).
name: FacebookGraphAPI
title: FacebookGraphAPI

api_list.name: getProfile
getProfilePicture
addComment

optional_parameters.name: attachment_id
optional_parameters.description: An optional ID of a unpublished photo uploaded to Facebook to include as a photo comment.

optional_parameters.name: attachment_url
optional_parameters.description: The URL of an image to include as a photo comment.

api_list.name: addFeedPost

optional_parameters.name: privacy
optional_parameters.description: Determines the privacy settings of the post. If not supplied, this defaults to the privacy level granted to the app in the Login Dialog. This field cannot be used to set a more open privacy setting than the one granted.

optional_parameters.name: message
optional_parameters.description: The main body of the post, otherwise called the status message. Either link, place, or message must be supplied.

optional_parameters.name: place
optional_parameters.description: Page ID of a location associated with this post. Either link, place, or message must be supplied..

optional_parameters.name: link
optional_parameters.description: The URL of a link to attach to the post. Either link, place, or message must be supplied. Additional fields associated with link are shown below.

optional_parameters.name: object_attachment
optional_parameters.description: Facebook ID for an existing picture in the person's photo albums to use as the thumbnail image. They must be the owner of the photo, and the photo cannot be part of a message attachment.

optional_parameters.name: tags
optional_parameters.description: Comma-separated list of user IDs of people tagged in this post. You cannot specify this field without also specifying a place.

api_list.name: addLike
addPhotoToAlbum
api_list.description: Add new photo to user album.

required_parameters.name: photo
required_parameters.description: The URL of a photo that is already uploaded to the internet.

optional_parameters.name: no_story
optional_parameters.description: If set to true, this will suppress the feed story that is automatically generated on a person's profile when they upload a photo using your app.

optional_parameters.name: message
optional_parameters.description: The description of the photo, used as the accompanying status message in any feed story.

optional_parameters.name: place
optional_parameters.description: Page ID of a place associated with the Photo.

api_list.name: createAlbum

optional_parameters.name: message
optional_parameters.description: The album's caption. This appears below the title of the album in the album view.

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description: A text location of the album for non-page locations.

optional_parameters.name: place
optional_parameters.description: The ID of a location page to tag the album with.

api_list.name: deleteComment
deleteFeedPost
deleteLike
extendUserToken
getAlbum
getAlbumPhotos
getComments
getCurrentProfile
getLikes
getPhoto
getUserAlbums
getUsersFeed
getUsersFriends
getUsersLikedPages
updateComment

required_parameters.name: is_hidden
required_parameters.description: Whether this comment is hidden or visible. The original poster can still see the comment, along with the page admin and anyone else tagged in the comment

api_list.name: validateUserToken

required_parameters.name: access_token
required_parameters.description: Access token obtained from Facebook which should be validated.
